3 InitialAlignment::InitialAlignment(PointCloudRGB::Ptr target_cloud, PointCloudRGB::Ptr source_cloud)
4  : _aligned_cloud(new PointCloudRGB)
5 {
6  _target_cloud = target_cloud;
7  _source_cloud = source_cloud;
8  configParameters();
9  transform_exists = false;
10  _rigid_tf = Eigen::Matrix4f::Zero();
11 }

13 void InitialAlignment::run()
14 {
15  // Viewer v;
16  // v.addPCToViewer<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(_source_cloud, "source");
17  // v.addPCToViewer<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(_target_cloud, "target");
18 
19  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr source_normals(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
20  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr target_normals(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
21  getNormals(_source_cloud, _normal_radius, source_normals);
22  getNormals(_target_cloud, _normal_radius, target_normals);
23 
24  // v.addNormalsToViewer<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal>(_source_cloud, source_normals, "n_source");
25  // v.addNormalsToViewer<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal>(_target_cloud, target_normals, "n_target");
26 
27  PointCloudRGB::Ptr target_keypoints(new PointCloudRGB);
28  PointCloudRGB::Ptr source_keypoints(new PointCloudRGB);
29  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr target_features(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33> ());
30  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr source_features(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33> ());
31  getKeypointsAndFeatures(_source_cloud, source_normals, source_keypoints, source_features);
32  getKeypointsAndFeatures(_target_cloud, target_normals, target_keypoints, target_features);
33 
34  Utils::colorizeCloud(source_keypoints, 0, 255, 0);
35  Utils::colorizeCloud(target_keypoints, 0, 255, 0);
36  // v.addPCToViewer<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(source_keypoints,"key");
37  // v.addPCToViewer<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(target_keypoints,"tkey");
38 
39  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr correspondences(new pcl::Correspondences);
40  performInitialAlingment(source_features, target_features, source_keypoints, target_keypoints, correspondences);
41 
42  applyTFtoCloud();
43 
44  // v.addCorrespondencesToViewer<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(source_keypoints, target_keypoints, correspondences);
45  // v.deletePCFromViewer("source");
46  // v.addPCToViewer<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(_aligned_cloud,"aligned");
47 }

49 Eigen::Matrix4f InitialAlignment::getRigidTransform()
50 {
51  if(!transform_exists)
52  ROS_ERROR("No transform yet. Please run algorithm");
53  return _rigid_tf;
54 }
55 
56 void InitialAlignment::configParameters()
57 {
58  // si los parametros son el mismo para ambas tiene que depender de las dos
59  double target_res = Utils::computeCloudResolution(_target_cloud);
60  double source_res = Utils::computeCloudResolution(_source_cloud);
61 
62  _normal_radius = (target_res + source_res) * 2.0; // 2 times higher
63  _feature_radius = _normal_radius*1.20; // 20% higher
64  _inlier_threshold = 1e-5;//2.5;
65 
66  // ROS_INFO("Parameters: \n\tnormal radius: %f, \ n\tfeature radius: %f",_normal_radius, _feature_radius);
67 }
68 
69 bool InitialAlignment::getNormals(PointCloudRGB::Ptr &cloud,
70  double normal_radius,
71  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr &normals)
72 {
73  ROS_INFO("Computing normals with radius: %f",normal_radius);
74  pcl::NormalEstimation<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal> ne;
75  ne.setInputCloud(cloud);
76 
77  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tree(new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB> ());
78  ne.setSearchMethod(tree);
79 
80  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr cloud_normals(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
81  ne.setRadiusSearch(normal_radius);
82  ne.compute(*normals);
83 
84  // As we compute normal for each point in cloud, must have same size
85  bool success = normals->points.size()==cloud->points.size() ? true : false;
86 
87  return success;
88 }
89 
90 std::vector<float> InitialAlignment::getScaleValues(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud)
91 {
92  std::vector<float> scale_values;
93 
94  double cloud_resolution = Utils::computeCloudResolution(cloud);
95  // scale_values.push_back((float)cloud_resolution*0.1);
96  scale_values.push_back((float)cloud_resolution*1);
97  scale_values.push_back((float)cloud_resolution*2);
98  scale_values.push_back((float)cloud_resolution*3);
99  scale_values.push_back((float)cloud_resolution*4);
100  scale_values.push_back((float)cloud_resolution*5);
101  scale_values.push_back((float)cloud_resolution*6);
102 
103  return scale_values;
104 }

106 void InitialAlignment::printScaleValues(const std::vector<float> &scale_values)
107 {
108  ROS_INFO("scale:");
109  for (int i=0; i<scale_values.size(); i++)
110  {
111  ROS_INFO("%f",scale_values[i]);
112  }
113 }
114 
115 void InitialAlignment::getKeypointsAndFeatures(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud,
116  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals,
117  PointCloudRGB::Ptr keypoints_cloud,
118  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr features)
119 {
120  // SELECTED DESCRIPTOR: FPFH
121  ROS_INFO("1. Set descriptor FPFH with radius: %f",_feature_radius);
122  pcl::FPFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal, pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr
123  fest(new pcl::FPFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal, pcl::FPFHSignature33>);
124  fest->setInputCloud(cloud);
125  fest->setInputNormals(normals);
126  // fest->setRadiusSearch(_feature_radius);
127  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tree(new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
128  fest->setSearchMethod(tree);
129 
130  ROS_INFO("2. Define feature persistence");
131  pcl::MultiscaleFeaturePersistence<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::FPFHSignature33> fper;
132  boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<int> > keypoints(new std::vector<int>); // Interest points
133  std::vector<float> scale_values = getScaleValues(cloud);
134  // printScaleValues(scale_values);
135  fper.setScalesVector(scale_values);
136  fper.setAlpha(0.6f);
137  fper.setFeatureEstimator(fest);
138  fper.setDistanceMetric(pcl::CS);
139 
140  ROS_INFO("3. Extracting keypoints");
141  fper.determinePersistentFeatures(*features, keypoints);
142 
143  // ROS_INFO("keypoints: %zu", keypoints->size());
144  bool success = keypoints->size()==features->size() ? true : false;
145 
146  Utils::indicesFilter(cloud, keypoints_cloud, keypoints);
147 }
148 
149 
150 void InitialAlignment::performInitialAlingment(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr source_features,
151  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr target_features,
152  PointCloudRGB::Ptr source_keypoints,
153  PointCloudRGB::Ptr target_keypoints,
154  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr corr_filtered)
155 {
156  ROS_INFO("4. Use descriptor FPFH to compute correspondences");
157  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr correspondences(new pcl::Correspondences);
158  pcl::registration::CorrespondenceEstimation<pcl::FPFHSignature33, pcl::FPFHSignature33> cest;
159  cest.setInputSource(source_features);
160  cest.setInputTarget(target_features);
161  cest.determineCorrespondences(*correspondences);
162 
163  ROS_INFO("5. Get correspondences with inlier threshold: %f",_inlier_threshold);
164  pcl::registration::CorrespondenceRejectorSampleConsensus<pcl::PointXYZRGB> rejector;
165  rejector.setInputSource(source_keypoints);
166  rejector.setInputTarget(target_keypoints);
167  rejector.setInlierThreshold(_inlier_threshold);
168  rejector.setMaximumIterations(10000);
169  rejector.setRefineModel(false);
170  rejector.setInputCorrespondences(correspondences);
171  rejector.getCorrespondences(*corr_filtered);
172 
173  ROS_INFO("6. Get rigid transformation");
174  pcl::registration::TransformationEstimationSVD<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB> trans_est;
175  trans_est.estimateRigidTransformation(*source_keypoints,*target_keypoints,
176  *corr_filtered, _rigid_tf);
177  transform_exists = true;
178 }
179 
180 void InitialAlignment::applyTFtoCloud()
181 {
182  pcl::transformPointCloud(*_source_cloud,*_aligned_cloud,_rigid_tf);
183 }
184 
185 void InitialAlignment::applyTFtoCloud(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud)
186 {
187  pcl::transformPointCloud(*cloud,*cloud,_rigid_tf);
188 }

190 
191 void InitialAlignment::getAlignedCloud(PointCloudRGB::Ptr aligned_cloud)
192 {
193  pcl::copyPointCloud(*_aligned_cloud, *aligned_cloud);
194 }

196 void InitialAlignment::getAlignedCloudROSMsg(sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 &aligned_cloud_msg)
197 {
198  pcl::toROSMsg(*_aligned_cloud,aligned_cloud_msg);
199  aligned_cloud_msg.header.frame_id = Utils::_frame_id;
200  aligned_cloud_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
201 }
